name: Algorithm Visualizer
desc: A 3D website to help computer science students visualize common algorithms, such as searching, sorting, and graphs.
Optimized to support up to thousands of meshes without issues.

name: Vanier Robotics Homepage
desc: A WebGL experience with many interactions, made for the home page of Vanier's 2024 robotics home page.
Made with custom shaders to make the website more immersive.
Highly optimized on all devices, supports Safari.

name: Multi-window Canvas
desc: A demo of inter-window communication through the browser's local storage

name: IntelliHouse
desc: A responsive and intuitive web application that allows users to monitor and control IoT devices, made without a web framework.
Runs on a Raspberry Pi, ESP8266, and sensors and IoT protocols like MQTT and Bluetooth.

name: Color Switcher
desc: A simple 3D game where you switch colors and avoid obstacles to pass levels.
Uses a physics engine to simulate gravity and collisions.

name: Crimes API
desc: A RESTful API that provides information about crimes in Los Angeles
Follows the MVC pattern and adheres to RESTful principles.

name: PinPoint
desc: A mobile application that allows users to share pins on a map

name: Ghostly Echoes
desc: A game in Unity 3D, in a school horror setting.
The player must escape the school while they might encounter creatures on their way.

name: Vanier Schedule Builder
desc: Generates all possible schedules with the courses you want to take.
Could previously fetch courses in real-time, but due to restrictions, it now uses a periodic dump.

name: LuaJoin
desc: A Lua project bundler that allows you to bundle Lua projects into a single file.
Supports relative and absolute imports, and static type checking from Luau.
